amendment.description: An amendment numbered 76 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to delist the Iran Revolutionary Guard Corps as a Foreign Terrorist Organization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 351 - 81 (Roll no. 496).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 351 - 81 (Roll no. 496).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 351 - 81 (Roll no. 496).
